name: Perfect Dive
summary: You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall.
description:
You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall. You intentionally Leap or otherwise fall into the water, taking no falling damage regardless of the distance.Traits

Azarketi: Amphibious humanoids who live among the seas of the Inner Sea region, said to have descended from the people of Azlant. Sometimes known as gillmen or Low Azlanti.

Azarketis craft and use these weapons.
